thread.title: Scuffle in Gujarat assembly, three members injured
thread.title_full: Scuffle in Gujarat assembly, three members injured

author: Mahesh Langa
title: Scuffle in Gujarat assembly, three members injured
text:
February 23, 2017 12:00   12:06 IST more-in 
Gujarat Assembly on Thursday witnessed ugly scenes as members of the opposition and ruling party entered into scuffle and exchanged body blows and hurled abuses which left three members injured. 
Two Congress MLAs Baldevji Thakor and one BJP MLA and junior minister Nirmala Vadhwani have received minor injuries when the members rushed to the well and started exchanging blows. 
Following the clashes, Speaker Ramanlal Vora adjourned the House for some time. The scuffle was triggered when a Congress MLA Paresh Dhanani asked about reasons for farmers' suicide in Amreli district. 
The question prompted heated arguments between members which eventually led to scuffle and body blows. Senior Congress MLA Shaktisinh Gohil termed the incident as "black day" for democracy and accused the ruling party members of attacking the opposition members. 
After the House was reconvened, Speaker Vora suspended two Congress MLAs for starting the clashes. 
Meanwhile, Baldevji Thakor, who received injury in his leg, said he would file a police complaint against BJP MLAs for attack on him inside the assembly.
